casebody.data:
John B. CROUSE
v.
Tamara S. COX AC 38462 Appellate Court of Connecticut. Submitted on briefs May 23, 2017
Officially released July 4, 2017 John B. Crouse, self-represented, the appellant (plaintiff) filed a brief. Sheldon, Beach and Harper, Js. PER CURIAM.

The judgment of dismissal is vacated. The case is remanded for further proceedings, without prejudice to the filing of a motion for summary judgment.
